org.robolectric.util
Class SQLite

java.lang.Object
  org.robolectric.util.SQLite

public class SQLite
extends Object

SQL utility methods to support the database-related shadows, such as ShadowSQLiteDatabase and ShadowSQLiteCursor.

Nested Class Summary
static class SQLite.SQLStringAndBindings
          Container for a SQL fragment and the objects which are to be bound to the arguments in the fragment.

Method Detail

buildInsertString

public static SQLite.SQLStringAndBindings buildInsertString(String table,
                                                            android.content.ContentValues values,
                                                            int conflictAlgorithm)
                                                     throws SQLException
Create a SQL INSERT string. Returned values are then bound via JDBC to facilitate various data types.

Parameters:
table - table name
values - column name/value pairs
conflictAlgorithm - the conflict algorithm to use
Returns:
insert string
Throws:
SQLException

buildUpdateString

public static SQLite.SQLStringAndBindings buildUpdateString(String table,
                                                            android.content.ContentValues values,
                                                            String whereClause,
                                                            String[] whereArgs)
Create a SQL UPDATE string. Returned values are then bound via JDBC to facilitate various data types.

Parameters:
table - table name
values - column name/value pairs
whereClause - SQL where clause fragment
whereArgs - Array of substitutions for args in whereClause
Returns:
update string

                                      String[] selectionArgs)
                               throws android.database.sqlite.SQLiteException

Parameters:

fetchGeneratedKey

public static long fetchGeneratedKey(ResultSet resultSet)
                              throws SQLException
Fetches generated key from resultSet and immediately closes supplied resultSet.

Parameters:
resultSet - resultSet returned from Statement.getGeneratedKeys()
Returns:
fetched key, -1 otherwise
Throws:
SQLException - if ResultSet.next() or ResultSet.close() will throw an exception
